title: Your thoughts on the new udyr

body:
Whaddo you guys think of the new udyr rework, im like 900k in and im not liking the look of it thus far (all the scalings look whack and nothing is really cohesive/synergetic, stacking cdr on a passive is redundant due to cdr cap and build paths, and they're removing the one redeeming factor, being his movespeed boosts and ability to kite.)

I dunno guys but im feeling like this is a buttf*cking.

Guess we'll have to wait and see.

Whaddo you guys reckon?

replies.body:
In conclusion, maybe swap cdr on passive for move speed, run ad scalings off total ad, not bonus ad, as to incorporate passive into the skills for a more well rounded feeling champ. 

Other than that I'm liking the look of the everything, a phys phoenix could very well be the goods, just take away the stupid stuff and I'm keen af
